item.description: Roberta Rocca, PhD, MSc Postdoctoral researcher _Psychoinformatics Lab_Department of PsychologyUniversity of Texas at Austin Date of birth : 17/11/1992 Mobile : +1 (512) 647 - 8764 roberta.rocca@austin.utexas.edu @RockBerta Research interests fMRI, Language, Social Cognition, Semantics, Spatial Cognition Education and employment 12/2019 – ongoing Postdoctoral researcher Psychoinformatics Lab, Dept. of Psychology, University of Texas at Austin 09/2019 – 10/2019 Research Assistant Interacting Minds Centre, Aarhus University , Denmark

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there! I am a postdoctoral researcher with Tal Yarkoni at Psychoinformatics Lab, Department of Psychology, UT Austin. I hold a PhD in Cognitive Neuroscience from the Department of Linguistics, Cognitive Science and Semiotics and the Interacting Minds Centre at Aarhus University. I worked under the supervision of Mikkel Wallentin, Kristian Tylén and Kenny Coventry on the neural correlates of spatial demonstratives, using naturalistic imaging, large-scale behavioral experiments and interactive two-persons paradigms.
